name: Rostrum India Social Organization

address: Shop No 3 / 5, Chandrashila Complex, Pokale Nagar,Opp Ashirwad Mangal Karyalaya, NDA Road,

briefDescription: ISO (Rostrum India Social Organization) is registered nonprofit organization (NGO) based in Pune city, Maharashtra. Rostrum is registered under section 25, Companies act 1956. Rostrum India Social Organization is an initiative by the youth from all sections of our society. Hence, it was envisioned as a common platform for the youth to come forward and join hands, in reforming and rebuilding our society. The youth of this country has a tremendous potential, primarily due to its sheer size. We strive to mobilize them in order to make them understand their responsibilities towards the society and inspire them to take up social work, which will lead to a better tomorrow.Team RISO working on different projects dedicated to Education, Healthcare, Environment and Women Empowerment sectors. RISO is also working to spread awareness about various social issues and topics with the support of our team members and volunteers

address: Shop No 3 / 5, Chandrashila Complex, Pokale Nagar, NDA Road,
